biotools.summary: An R-package that provides advanced funcionality to perform file-level QC of single genome-wide association (GWA) data-sets, to conduct quality control across several GWA data-sets (meta-level QC) and to simplify data-handling of large-scale GWA data-sets.

bioschemas.name: EasyQC
bioschemas.summary: An R-package that provides advanced funcionality to perform file-level QC of single genome-wide association (GWA) data-sets, to conduct quality control across several GWA data-sets (meta-level QC) and to simplify data-handling of large-scale GWA data-sets.
